channel.title: Help with morrigans , vesta, statius, and zuriels please! simple fix just cant
channel.description:
okay i need help fixing my 1. morrigans wont weild correctly, zuriels wont either! 2 vesta, and statius plates are glitched on the arms???
okay here are the codes i inputed fixed them alittle but still arms glitched and morrigans wont weild same with zuriels plus morrigans jav is weilded like 2 inches from your hand lol?? [code=javascript]item = 13794 Vesta's_Chainbody Vesta's chainbody. 500000 500000 500000 5 7 7 -15 0 120 131 145 -3 140 6 0 item = 13796 Vesta's_plateskirt Vesta's_platerskirt. 500000 500000 500000 3 5 5 -17 -4 86 100 112 -2 118 3 0 item = 13798 Vesta's_spear Vesta's_spear. 500000 500000 500000 133 113 120 0 0 18 21 21 0 0 122 0 item = 13802 Zuriels_Robe_Bottom Zuriels_Robe_Bottom 500000 500000 500000 0 0 0 25 -7 38 35 44 24 0 0 0 item = 13800 Zuriels_Robe Zuriels_Robe 500000 500000 500000 0 0 0 35 -10 63 45 74 35 0 0 0 item = 13804 Zuriel_Hood Zuriel_Hood 500000 500000 500000 0 0 0 8 -2 20 16 22 8 0 0 0 item = 13806 Zuriel_staff Zuriel_staff 500000 500000 500000 13 -1 65 18 0 5 7 4 18 0 72 0 item = 13818 Morrigan_coif Morrigan_coif 500000 500000 500000 0 0 0 -5 13 8 11 14 8 12 0 0 item = 13814 Morrigan_Body Morrigan_Body 500000 500000 500000 0 0 0 -15 36 61 53 66 75 62 0 0 item = 13816 Morrigan_Chaps Morrigan_Chaps 500000 500000 500000 0 0 0 -10 23 35 29 37 46 35 0 0 item = 13822 Morrigan_Throwing_axe Morrigan_Throwing_axe 500000 500000 500000 0 85 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 85 0 item = 13820 Morrigan_Javelin Morrigan_Javelin 500000 500000 500000 0 100 70 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 100 0 item = 13812 Statius_full_helm Statius_full_helm 1500000000 1500000000 1500000000 3 3 4 -6 -2 65 70 63 -1 71 3 0 item = 13810 Statius_Platelegs Statius_Platelegs 1500000000 1500000000 1500000000 3 3 5 -21 -7 110 106 97 -4 121 3 0 item = 13808 Statius_Platebody Statius_Platebody 1500000000 1500000000 1500000000 5 5 7 -30 -10 154 145 121 -6 157 5 0 [ENDOFITEMLIST][/code]
what are the right ones if these are wrong its 317 server/client

okay i need help fixing my 1. morrigans wont weild correctly, zuriels wont either! 2 vesta, and statius plates are glitched on the arms???

okay here are the codes i inputed fixed them alittle but still arms glitched and morrigans wont weild same with zuriels plus morrigans jav is weilded like 2 inches from your hand lol??
